events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer issue has been classified under the refund category due to request for money back.
Support agent Emma has been assigned to handle the refund case for the customer complaint.
Hello! I'm Emma from customer support. I understand you want a refund for the wrong item received.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received to proceed with the refund?
Sure, my order number is 987654321 and I have attached the picture of the incorrect item that arrived.
Thank you for the details. We will process a full refund within 3-5 business days and send you a confirmation email shortly.
I appreciate the quick response. Looking forward to receiving the refund soon.
The refund has been initiated and a confirmation email was sent. Please allow 3-5 business days for the amount to appear.
Hello! Just following up to ensure you received the refund and everything is now satisfactory with your order.
Since the refund was confirmed and the customer has no further concerns, we are closing this case. Thank you!
